comment: A man kills a deer and takes it home to cook fordinner. Both he and his wife decide that they won't tell thekidswhat kind of meat it is but will give them a clue and let them guess. The kids were eager to know what the meat was on their plates, so they begged their dad for the clue. Well, he said, "It's what mummy calls me sometimes". The little girl screams to her brother, "Don't eat it, it's an arsehole.."
